settings.label: Keywords for homepage
settings.default: Eliah theme, Fastest, Ajax Shop, Minimal, Lazyload

settings.label: Author for Shop
settings.info: Define the author of a Shop.

settings.label: Enabled Production Mode
settings.info: The production mode will Minify JS, CSS, HTML to optimize speed site

settings.label: Enabled RTL in list code countries
settings.default: AR BH EG IL IQ JO KW LB PS SY
settings.info: Use the country's ISO [language code](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_ISO_639-1_codes). Separate your language codes with a space.

settings.content: To offer multiple currencies on your online store, you must first [edit your store's currency formatting](https://docs.shopify.com/support/settings/general/tell-my-script-where-to-find-money-formats).

settings.label: Enable currency conversion
settings.info: Even though prices are displayed in different currencies, orders will still be processed in your store's currency.

settings.label: Supported currencies
settings.default: GBP USD EUR CAD JPY AUD CNY VND
settings.info: Use the country's ISO [currency code](http://www.xe.com/iso4217.php). Separate your currency codes with a space.

settings.label: Show countdown
settings.info: Show the time countdown to  for the product off price. You may in the tags of product and set time in the example after đâu (yy / mm / dd hh: ii: ss) => (2022/09/03 23:20:00)

settings.label: Text countdown
settings.default: Hurry Up! Special Offers end in:

settings.label: Width zoom
settings.info: Use only for Zoom Window, enter 0 => auto

settings.label: Height zoom
settings.info: Use only for Zoom Window, enter 0 => auto

settings.label: Free shipping value
settings.info: If you offer free shipping on orders more than $200, set $1000 here.

settings.label: Show 'Footbar' section ?
settings.info: Display a footbar when scrolling passed the add-to-cart button.

settings.content: Configure options for 'Real time XX visitor right now'
Configure the product variant design. You can show product options as 'Text', 'Large Text', 'Circle color', 'Circle image', 'Square color', 'Square image', or 'Select' - a dropdown list.

settings.label: Hide options without availability variants
settings.info: Hide out of stock variants. Or show product option as unavailable.

settings.label: Visibility on listing
settings.info: Set number of options to show on collection page. 'Add to cart' button transforms to 'select options' button.

settings.label: Options type 'Circle color'
settings.info: Separator is '|'. Show product option as circle with color background. Option name should have a [CSS color value](https://www.w3schools.com/cssref/css_colors.asp).

settings.label: Options type 'Circle image'
settings.info: Separator is '|'. Show product option as circle with image. You should configure images per each product variant.

settings.label: Options type 'Square color'
settings.info: Separator is '|'. Show product option as square with color background.

settings.label: Options type 'Square image'
settings.info: Separator is '|'. Show product option as square with image.

settings.label: Options type 'Select'
settings.info: Separator is '|'. Show product option as drop-down list.

settings.label: Options type 'Large text'
settings.info: Separator is '|'. Show option as bigger text.

settings.content: Fill 'Color|Colour' to input box which you want to active the type.

settings.label: Max number products
settings.info: The number of products I have on a page

settings.label: Max Pager Auto Scroll Load
settings.info: The value 1 only show button load more

settings.label: Aspect Ratio
settings.info: Aspect Ratio Custom will settings in General panel.

settings.label: Show the description (Only show on list view)
Show product reviews
settings.info: You have to install product reviews app. At our demo, we use a free [Product Reviews](https://apps.shopify.com/product-reviews) app

settings.content: If your customer is logged-in, the country in his default shipping address will be selected. If you are not sure about the  spelling to use here, refer to the first checkout page.

Do not forget to include the snippet shipping-calculator in your cart.liquid template where you want the shipping  calculator to appear. You can get the snippet here: [shipping-calculator.liquid](https://github.com/carolineschnapp/shipping-calculator/blob/master/shipping-calculator.liquid) .

settings.label: MailChimp form action URL
settings.info: [How to create form builder with mail chimp](https://mailchimp.com/help/how-the-form-builder-works/#About_the_form_builder).

settings.label: Animation style for content on product image hover (Collection Page, carousel product, tab product)
Favicon image
settings.info: Will be scaled down to 32 x 32px

settings.label: Favicon retina image
settings.info: Upload image: png, ico, Will be scaled down to 152 x 152px
